amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain land located in Nye County, Nevada.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1732 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1732 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S11625; text: CR S11625) To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain land located in Nye County, Nevada.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1732 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1732 proposed by Senator Reid.
